audioText: Ce seigneur médiéval était complètement foutu intérieurement à cause des flux migratoires complexes affectant ses terres ancestrales.
question: Why was this medieval lord completely messed up internally?
options: Because of complex migratory flows affecting his ancestral lands
Because of ongoing conflicts with neighboring kingdoms
Because of economic difficulties caused by poor harvests
Because of political pressure from the royal court
explanation: The correct answer is 'Because of complex migratory flows affecting his ancestral lands'. The text states 'Ce seigneur médiéval était complètement foutu intérieurement à cause des flux migratoires complexes affectant ses terres ancestrales' - This medieval lord was completely messed up internally because of complex migratory flows affecting his ancestral lands. 'Foutu' is the past participle of 'foutre' (to mess up), 'seigneur' means 'lord', and 'intérieurement' means 'internally'.
